name: SpaceDrone M8-Avenger
description: The M-8 Avenger(space drone) is dropped on one of the space stations in the galaxy. You have to take control over the drone solve puzzles to investigate and/or repair a station. Be careful! In the first level, the player (you) has to go round the whole map and push red buttons. The aim is to press all 11 buttons to advance to the next level (if there is one).
